                    ### Question
                    Which of the following about phenytoin is true ?

                    ### Options
                    opa. It follows zero order kinetics
opb. Not an hepatic enzyme inducer
opc. It is excreted unchanged in urine
opd. It is not teratogenic

### Enhanced Information (For Contextual Support):
Phenytoin follows zero-order kinetics, where a fixed amount of drug is metabolized per unit time regardless of the drug concentration. It is also an hepatic enzyme inducer, not excreted unchanged in urine, and is teratogenic, associated with fetal hydantoin syndrome.
